snippet.title: The Last Planets - Full Teaser
snippet.description:
GAME IS FREE TO TRY: 🟢 https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.TronusGames.TheLastPlanets


The Full Teaser of The Last Planets game for Android is out now. 
Stay tuned on our social links below!


Assembled by a single indie developer and an awesome sound designer, this is a FREE 2D/3D scroller videogame for Android with Online features, endless and strange Levels, account progression, different planets to play and Achievements. You can play both Online or Offline in this game. 


CURRENTLY IN OPEN BETA.



💸 No P2W (Pay To Win)
💳 No Microtransactions based
⌚ No Advertising

This is intended to be a 🆓 Free Game to try it, with one unique purchase to 🪙 Unlock it Completely.
If you want to support this kind of development, thanks in advance. 🦄




Every 🗣️ feedback is appreciated and welcome to improve the game.


Follow our 👨‍👩‍👧‍👦 communities on: 
🎮 TronusGames Website: https://bio.link/tronusgames
🎮 Project Utgardr Website: https://bio.link/projectutgardr

🔵 Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/developer/tronusgames
🟤 Itch.io: https://tronusgames.itch.io/
⚪ Game Jolt: https://gamejolt.com/@TronusGames/games
🟢 Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/dev?id=7350736874255872221
⚫ Indie DB: https://www.indiedb.com/company/tronusgames

🔵 Facebook: https://facebook.com/tronusgames
🔵 Twitter: https://twitter.com/tronusgames
🟣  Instagram: https://instagram.com/tronusgames
⚫ TikTok: https://tiktok.com/@tronusgames
🟠  Reddit: https://reddit.com/r/TronusGames
🔴 YouTube: https://youtube.com/channel/UCFgxHSCQQ5OJJWaLgthvUMA?sub_confirmation=1
🟣 Twitch: https://twitch.tv/tronusgamesofficial/about
🟣 Discord: https://discord.com/invite/hdx8dVpmaU
🔵 Donations: https://paypal.com/donate/?hosted_button_id=8L8RY5CB9HGUG
🟠 Patreon: https://patreon.com/TronusGames



Musics and Sounds by Marco Marocco and under Copyright.


#videogames #gaming #mobilegaming
